download_entitlements_expires_logic_chec.name: download_entitlements_expires_logic_check
download_entitlements_expires_logic_chec.value: expires_at IS NULL OR expires_at > created_at

download_entitlements_used_logic_check.name: download_entitlements_used_logic_check
download_entitlements_used_logic_check.value: (remaining = 0 AND used_at IS NOT NULL) OR (remaining > 0 AND used_at IS NULL)

download_type_consistency_check.name: download_type_consistency_check
download_type_consistency_check.value:
(download_type = 'free' AND amount_paid = 0 AND digital_transaction_id IS NULL) OR
    (download_type = 'paid' AND amount_paid > 0 AND digital_transaction_id IS NOT NULL)
